Shader * loadShader (string vert, string frag)

Detailed Description

Loads shaders and assures not to load them multiple times for different materials.

Shader * Shaderloader::loadShader ( string  vert,
string  frag 
)

creates a shader program and returns a reference to it.

Parameters:
vert name of the vertex shader (without file ending)
frag name of the fragment shader (without file ending)
Returns:
reference to the shader object that has been newly created
